src_lang: The Homa Bay County Legislature is now amending the Education Bursary Fund Amendment bill 2018 to ensure that people living with disabilities are included in the bursary committee and help ensure that the bursary is distributed fairly and without corruption.
template: Bunge mar County ma Homa Bay koro otimo lokruok ne chike matayo weche mag chiwo bursary mag somo mongere kaka Education Bursary Fund Ammendment bill 2018 mabiro konyo neno ni jogo ma odak gi ng'ol bende onyuandi e komiti mochungne bursary kod konyo neno ni bursaryno ipogo e yoo mowinjore maonge mibadhi moro amora

text_to_decode.text: The [ Homa Bay County Legislature ] is now amending the Education Bursary Fund Amendment bill 2018 to ensure that people living with disabilities are included in the bursary committee and help ensure that the bursary is distributed fairly and without corruption.

src_lang: The agency of nasa Raila Amolo Odinga now invites the residents of kisumu county to prepare to welcome the president of Kenya during his visit to the city next December the first visit of the president for the first time since last year's elections and to greet each other in March this year.
template: Ogai mar nasa Raila Amolo Odinga koro okwayo jodak e county ma kisumu mondo mii oikore mar rwako ker Kenyataa e kinde ma obiro wendo bomano machiegni e dwe marapar gariyo limbeno mokuongo mar ker kenyataa chakre yiero ma higa mokalo to kod tok mosruok e kindgi dwe mar adek higani

text_to_decode.text: The agency of nasa [ Raila Amolo Odinga ] now invites the residents of kisumu county to prepare to welcome the president of Kenya during his visit to the city next December the first visit of the president for the first time since last year's elections and to greet each other in March this year.

The agency of nasa Raila Amolo Odinga now invites the residents of kisumu county to prepare to welcome the president of [ Kenya ] during his visit to the city next December the first visit of the president for the first time since last year's elections and to greet each other in March this year.

src_lang: It has recently been announced that 40 wards of Homa Baygo County have been allocated bursaries totalling 2.5 million silings for the 2018 / 2019 financial year from 1.5 million silings that was included in the previous budget to ensure that all underprivileged children receive the bursary money.
template: Nyo oyango ni wards 40 mag County ma Homa Baygo oketnegi omenda maromo silings million 2 . 5 mar hik manyonge mar 2018 / 2019 kowuok e silings million 1 . 5 mane entieree e budget mokalo mar neno ni nyithindo duto maonge gi nyalo joyudo pes bursaryno

text_to_decode.text: It has recently been announced that 40 wards of [ Homa Baygo County ] have been allocated bursaries totalling 2.5 million silings for the 2018 / 2019 financial year from 1.5 million silings that was included in the previous budget to ensure that all underprivileged children receive the bursary money.
